card.name: Eternal Beauty
card.text: Creatures your opponents control lose deathtouch and can't have or gain deathtouch. At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Healing Assault
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice. You gain 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice. You gain 3 life. • Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the amount of life you have gained this turn.

card.name: Ancestral Barrage of Possibilities
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Target creature your opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn. • Target creature you control gets +0/+2 until end of turn. • Draw 3 cards.

card.name: Dark Assassin Swipe
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. • Add {B}{B}{B}. • You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Flawless Supreme Lightning
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn. • This spell deals 3 damage to any target. • Discard a card, then draw a card.

card.name: Orinosuke, Extracting Shinobi
card.text: Ninjutsu {U}{B} Whenever a ninja deals combat damage to an opponent, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn- • Defending player discards a card. • Draw a card. • Return target creature you control to its owners hand.

card.name: Xiang Zhou, Corrupted Noble
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a creature dies, create a tapped treasure token.

card.name: Hou Guo, Brutal Warrior
card.text: Trample This creature gets +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to it.

card.name: Xie Yawen, Humble Heroine
card.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Yan Bo, Biased Tax Collector
card.text: Lifelink Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

card.name: Liao Ru of Limitless Techniques
card.text: Prowess Instant and Sorcery spells cost {X} less, where X is this creatures power.

card.name: Kioko, Genius of the Sky
card.text: Flying, Vigilance Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kazushi, Stealer of Honor
card.text: Whenever a creature your opponent controls dies, but a +1/+1 counter on this creature. {1}{G}, {T}: This creature fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Itsuko the Lightning
card.text: Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card. This creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Vo Chi Kien, Student of the Past
card.text: When this creature enters, return up to one target permanent card not named Vo Chi Kien, Student of the Past and up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Kanabo of the Oni
card.text: Equipped Creature gets +3/+3 and gains "{T}: Destroy target artifact." Equip {3}

card.name: Hero on the Wind
card.text: Flying Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, scry 2.

card.name: Devoted Yojimbo
card.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn,each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

card.name: Unimposing Master
card.text: Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 1/1 white monk creature token.

card.name: Slice of Bladed Feathers
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three— • Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. • Targeted creature gains flying until end of turn. • Gain 7 life.

card.name: Spelljutsu Ninja
card.text: Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return an instant or sorcery with mana value 1 from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Aerial Daggermaster
card.text: Flying, Prowess

card.name: Ki Manipulation
card.text: Tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, if this spell is in the graveyard, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Typhoon Cut
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Target creature gains prowess until end of turn. • Targeted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. • Draw a card.

card.name: Hoarder of Wealth
card.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever you extort, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Ninja for Hire
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a treasure token. Ninjutsu {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)

card.name: Dishonored
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Strikes of Murderous Intent
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Target creature gains Deathtouch. • Destroy target enchantment an opponent controls. • Target player discards a card.

card.name: Hired Brute
card.text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it was equipped, create a treasure token.

card.name: Worthy Opponent
card.text: Prowess Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, add {R}.

card.name: Bandit's Assault
card.text: Target creature gains double strike and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, create a treasure token" until end of turn.

card.name: Bloody Storm
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. • Targeted creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. • This spell deals 1 damage to target player and each creature that player controls.

card.name: Dutiful Guardian
card.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Warrior of Dragon's Legacy
card.text: When this creature enters, choose one- • Attach an equipment you control to a creature you control. • Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Spiritual Guide
card.text: Spells you control and activated abilities of permanents you control targeting creatures you control cost {1} less.

card.name: Whispering Fang Strikes
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. • Put a +1/+1 counter and a trample counter on targeted creature. • Targeted creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

card.name: Sacred Katana
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has Ward {1}. (Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Equip {3}

card.name: Monk's Wraps
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each instant or sorcery cast this turn. Equip {2}

card.name: Majestic Leap
card.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever a creature enters, if this spell is in the graveyard, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Lighter than Air
card.text: Enchanted creature gains +1/+0 and gets flying. Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard during your turn, you may cast this spell from your graveyard until end of turn.

card.name: Warrior's Spirit
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control." Whenever a creature dies, if this spell is in the graveyard, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Shocking Strike
card.text: This spell deals 2 damage to target creature. Whenever you cast your second spell in a turn, if this spell is in you graveyard, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Warrior's Challenge
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Whenever a counter is put on a creature you control, if this spell is in your graveyard, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Giant Intensifying Kick
card.text: If this is the first Instant or Sorcery you've cast this turn do the first option, if it's the second, do the first two options, if it's the third, do all three- • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. • Target creature must be blocked this turn if able. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Sacred Meditation
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. Draw a card.
